sources.name: Product
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as string,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as string,
		ReorderPoint as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		Weight as string,
		ModelName as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string,
		Status as string,
		HUB_Product_HK as string,
		SAT_Product_HDIFF as string,
		LOAD_TS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> Product
